statements: SELECT * FROM Subscribers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT subscriber_id, first_name, last_name FROM Subscribers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Subscribers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM Subscribers WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT subscriber_id, email FROM Subscribers WHERE purchase_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Subscribers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT subscriber_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Subscribers WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY subscriber_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Subscribers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT subscriber_id, first_name, last_name, email, purchase_history FROM Subscribers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND behavior LIKE '%loyal%' ORDER BY subscriber_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Subscribers WHERE gender = 'Non-Binary' AND (age < 25 OR age > 50) ORDER BY age DESC, last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT email, age FROM subscribers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT subscriber_id, gender FROM subscribers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price > 100;
SELECT purchase_id, product_name, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT subscriber_id, email, country FROM subscribers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT subscriber_id, email, age, country FROM subscribers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT s.subscriber_id, s.email, p.product_name, p.purchase_date FROM subscribers s INNER JOIN purchases p ON s.subscriber_id = p.subscriber_id;
SELECT subscriber_id, email, country FROM subscribers WHERE country IN ('USA', 'Canada') ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers ORDER BY subscriber_id DESC;
SELECT email, age FROM subscribers WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT location, age, gender FROM subscribers WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT purchase_id, subscriber_id, purchase_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT behavior_id, behavior_type FROM subscriber_behavior WHERE behavior_type='Engagement'
SELECT subscriber_id, email, age, gender, location FROM subscribers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE gender = 'Male' AND location = 'USA' ORDER BY subscriber_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM subscribers WHERE age >= 25;
SELECT subscriber_id, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM subscriber_behavior ORDER BY subscriber_id ASC;

SELECT s.email, ph.purchase_amount, ph.purchase_date FROM subscribers s INNER JOIN purchase_history ph ON s.subscriber_id = ph.subscriber_id WHERE ph.purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY ph.purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM demographics;
SELECT id, name, age FROM demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, gender FROM demographics ORDER BY gender DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT campaign_name, send_date FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY send_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, gender FROM demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT subscriber_id, product, price FROM purchase_history WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM behavior WHERE activity_type = 'Login' AND activity_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, campaign_name FROM email_campaigns WHERE segment_type = 'Promotional' ORDER BY send_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Subscribers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM Subscribers WHERE segment = 'VIP';
SELECT subscriber_id, age, gender, location FROM Demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT purchase_date, total_amount, product_name FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE total_amount < 100;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM EmailCampaigns WHERE segment = 'Holiday';
SELECT * FROM Subscribers;
SELECT email_address, first_name, last_name FROM Subscribers ORDER BY signup_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_subscribers FROM Subscribers;
SELECT * FROM Demographics WHERE age > 30 AND income > 50000 ORDER BY age ASC, income DESC;
SELECT subscriber_id, page_views, clicks, last_activity FROM Behavior WHERE clicks > 10;
